item.title: 23 miners rescued after 43 hours trapped in Colombian gold mine
item.description: Twenty-three workers have been rescued after spending 43 hours trapped in a collapsed underground gold mine in northern Colombia

item.title: $205M awarded to parents of girl who fell to her death at Colorado amusement park
item.description: A jury has awarded $205 million to the parents of a 6-year-old girl who fell to her death at a Colorado amusement park after she wasn’t strapped in to...

item.title: Freeport shares tumble, copper futures rise on guidance cut due to Indonesia mine accident
item.description: Shares of Freeport-McMoRan are falling after the Phoenix-based miner said it expected a significant decline in third-quarter copper revenue

item.title: Judge scolds DOJ over public statements in UnitedHealthcare CEO murder case
item.description: A New York judge warns Justice Department officials they could face sanctions for public comments about Luigi Mangione's prosecution

item.title: Trump's touting of an unproven autism drug surprised many, including the doctor who proposed it
item.description: A Trump administration decision to repurpose an old chemotherapy drug for autism has surprised many experts — including the physician who recently pro...
